attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
What is a Puppy Farm?
..A Puppy farm is a place where puppies are bred for PROFIT. They do not care of the state/wellbeing of the dogs, all they want is MONEY!..They treat the breeding dogs as BATTERYS..once empty and old,They are CHUCKED in the bin..or the POUND for them.
My Cavalier King Charles Spaniel was an ex breeding stud dog who when I rescued was in a DISGUSTING state and I was appalled when I researched into Puppy Farming..It is disgusting and it needs to be banned,Its all about money to them. Please Help ban this.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
